titleStmt.title: The History of the amours of the French court viz. [brace] of Madam de La Valliere, Madam de Olonne, Madam de Chastillion, Madam de Sevigny, with the intrigues of several other persons of great quality in the Palace-Royal : in four parts / faithfully translated out of French.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for N.B. at the Three Cupids in the Kingdom of Love

notesStmt.note: Signatures: 1 leaf unsigned, B-E⁸, F⁷, B-P⁸ (H₄, M₇, canceled)
Pages 42-43, 46-47, 1st group of paging, p. 56, 2d group of paging, incorrectly numbered 46-47, 42-43, 65, respectively.
Running title, 2d group of paging: Loves empire; or, The gallantries of the French court.
Engraved illustrated t.-p., "The Queen of Maiorca novel. London Printed for Richard Bentley", inserted at front.
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.

place.placeName: the Three Cupids in the Kingdom of Love
